title: Sunset Crater Volcano National Monument: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery              Photo Gallery        Every fall wildflowers bloom in Bonito Meadow. NPS Photo (T.Jones)   Â                 Scenic Vistas of Sunset Crater Volcano   8 Photos  Scenic Vistas          Visitor Center Exhibits   4 Photos  Visitor Center Exhibits          Monsoon Wildflowers   20 Photos  Every monsoon season, nearby Bonito Meadow fills with wildflowers. Enjoy!            Winter Comes to Sunset Crater   8 Photos  Sunset Crater National Monument receives up to 100 inches of snow in the winter.           2014 Star Party    5 Photos  Sunset Crater Volcano National Monument is home to amazing night skies. Join us in the summer for one of our star parties.
